# Example of generated sections

```{r, results = "asis", echo = TRUE}
invisible(lapply(key_df[["key"]], function(key) {
  
  cat(c(
    "",
    paste0("## ", key),
    "",
    codedoc_lines("age_group"),
    ""
  ), sep = "\n")
  
}))
```
